author: ABC Radio National
title: Monday Finance with Tony Boyd
text:
Monday 21 September 2015 6:53AM (view full episode) 
When it comes to investing, it seems good news can also mean bad news for financial markets. 
The US Federal Reserve kept official interest rates in the US on hold at near zero levels last week -- yet Wall St had its biggest one day loss in two weeks. 
The Australian sharemarket on the other hand rallied on Friday for a third day, while the currency had a roller coaster ride. 
For a preview of the week ahead in business and finance, the Australian Financial Review Chanticleer columnist Tony Boyd joins Fran Kelly on RN Breakfast .
